game.title: The Lost Sword
game.description: An ancient sword has been stolen from the kingdom's treasury. The kingdom is in disarray and needs a hero to retrieve the sword and restore peace.
game.objective: Retrieve the lost sword from the treacherous dungeon.
game.reward: The kingdom's gratitude and a legendary armor set.

tasks.description: Find the entrance to the dungeon.
tasks.objective: Locate the hidden path leading to the dungeon entrance.

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian at the dungeon entrance.
tasks.objective: Overcome the guardian to gain access to the dungeon.
Solve puzzles and avoid traps to reach the depths of the dungeon.
Face the boss in a fierce battle and reclaim the lost sword.

tasks.description: Return the lost sword to King Arthur.
tasks.objective: Deliver the sword to the king and restore peace to the kingdom.
